Name: Iphone
Description: 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion for a faster, more responsive feel. Cinematic mode adds shallow depth of field and shifts focus automatically in your videos. Pro camera system with new 12MP Telephoto, Wide, and Ultra Wide cameras; LiDAR Scanner; 6x optical zoom range; macro photography; Photographic Styles, ProRes video, Smart HDR 4, Night mode, Apple ProRAW, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording. 12MP TrueDepth front camera with Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording. A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance. Up to 28 hours of video playback, the best battery life ever in an iPhone. Durable design with Ceramic Shield
